HomePage.heading: Welcome to Greenstand Wallet App!
HomePage.title: Greenstand Wallet App
HomePage.body: Greenstand Wallet App helps you connect your shop to Greenstand. It extends your checkout page to be able to sell clients Greenstand Impact Tokens, a token which represents a tree.

NotFound.description: Check the URL and try again, or use the search bar to find what you need.
NotFound.heading: There is no page at this address

Wallet.title: Wallet
Wallet.body: Each token represents one of the 6 million trees planted at Greenstand. By selling these, you are helping promote a green initiative which benefits both you and the client.
Wallet.heading: Buy tokens to sell to your clients
Wallet.modalHeading: Are you sure you want to buy {{tokenQuantity}} tokens?
